The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 November is 894,906 (1,589.9 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 October, there were 127,087 new confirmed cases (225.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 October, there were 118,733 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% ( 8,354 extra cases).
